languages.Name: Line POS
languages.Description: Predstavlja linijsku kasu za izdavanje računa na prodajnom mjestu. Omogućava brz unos stavki, podršku za fiskalizaciju, te izdavanje maloprodajnih računa.

languages.Name: Line POS
languages.Description: Represents a line-based POS system for issuing receipts at the point of sale. Enables fast item entry, fiscalization support, and retail invoice generation.

languages.Name: POS
languages.Description: Upravljanje prodajom efikasno uz unos i obradu transakcija, fiskalizaciju, praćenje zaliha, podršku za različite metode plaćanja i generisanje izvještaja. Povećanje efikasnosti i zadovoljstva kupaca brzim i pouzdanim uslugama

languages.Name: POS
languages.Description: Efficient management of sales through transaction entry and processing, fiscalization, inventory tracking, support for various payment methods, and report generation. Enhancing efficiency and customer satisfaction with fast and reliable services.

languages.Name: WMS
languages.Description: Modul za upravljanje skladištem. Omogućava praćenje zaliha, prijem i otpremu robe, kontrolu lokacija, praćenje serijskih brojeva, blokade zaliha, planiranje inventura i integraciju sa mobilnim uređajima i ERP sistemom.

languages.Name: WMS
languages.Description: Warehouse Management System module. Enables stock tracking, goods receipt and dispatch, location control, serial number tracking, stock blocking, inventory planning, and integration with mobile devices and ERP system.

languages.Name: HR
languages.Description: Modul za upravljanje ljudskim resursima. Omogućava evidenciju zaposlenika, ugovora, pozicija, odsustava, beneficija i drugih podataka vezanih za kadrovsku administraciju.

languages.Name: HR
languages.Description: Human Resources Management module. Provides management of employees, contracts, positions, absences, benefits, and other HR-related administration.

languages.Name: ERV
languages.Description: Modul za evidenciju radnog vremena. Omogućava planiranje radnog kalendara, praćenje prisustva i odsustva zaposlenika, evidentiranje prekovremenog rada te automatski obračun sihtarice i radnih sati.

languages.Name: WFM
languages.Description: Workforce Management module. Enables planning of work calendars, tracking of attendance and absences, overtime logging, and automated timesheet and working hours calculation.

languages.Name: PALS
languages.Description: Modul za evidenciju, praćenje i upravljanje prometom paleta. Omogućava optimizirano vođenje evidencije o stanju i kretanju paleta u skladištima i transportu.

languages.Name: PALS
languages.Description: Module for recording, tracking, and managing pallet transactions. Enables optimized record keeping of pallet status and movement in warehouses and transportation.

languages.Name: MOWS
languages.Description: Modul za mobilno upravljanje skladištem. Omogućava prijem i otpremu robe, povrate, prelokacije, raspored po lokacijama, sinhronizaciju i konfiguraciju putem mobilnih skenera.

languages.Name: MOWS
languages.Description: Mobile Warehousing System. Enables goods receipt and dispatch, returns, relocations, location mapping, synchronization and configuration via mobile scanners.

languages.Name: Administracija
languages.Description: Upravljanje administrativnim zadacima, uključujući kompanije, korisničke uloge, dozvole, korisnike i konfiguracije sistema. Omogućava efikasno upravljanje resursima i postavkama sistema.

languages.Name: Administration
languages.Description: Management of administrative tasks, including companies, user roles, permissions, users and system configurations. Enables efficient management of resources and system settings.
